ModMetaData.name: Simple Bulk Production
ModMetaData.author: dninemfive
ModMetaData.description:
Adds new bulk versions of various recipes.

Specifically, the following get bulk recipes in 1.3:
- medicine
- mortar shells
- slag smelting
- stonecutting (requires XmlExtensions).

If you get a red error about duplicate nodes, install XmlExtensions, but this is not a hard dependency.
